meanings.definition: The state or quality of being porous.
meanings.sent1: The porosities of the sponge allow water to pass through easily.
meanings.sent2: The rock's porosities make it ideal for filtering water.
meanings.sent3: The porosities in the cheese made it a holey masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: The porosities in the soil acted like tiny tunnels for the water to travel through.
meanings.sent5: The porosities of the fabric were so pronounced that you could see light shining through.

meanings.definition: The presence of pores or small openings in a material.
meanings.sent1: The porosities in the wood allowed for better air circulation.
meanings.sent2: The skin cream helps reduce the porosities on your face.
meanings.sent3: The porosities in the wall were so big, even ants could crawl through.
meanings.sent4: The porosities in the sponge soaked up the liquid like a thirsty sponge.
meanings.sent5: The porosities in the rock were like tiny windows into its interior.
